Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tile
  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Tile class for 3D-2048 game Individual Tile objects for the game grid
    Version:
    Final-1.0 06.02.2019 2:00pm
    Author:
    Jiahua Chen

      • setPower

        public boolean setPower​(int pow)
        attempts to set the power to pow
        Parameters:
        pow - power to set to
        Returns:
        true if successful; else false (or if pow are equal)

      • setLoc

        public void setLoc​(Loc newLoc)
        Sets both locs of tile to newLoc
        Parameters:
        newLoc - new Location of tile, after animation is over

      • setNewLoc

        public void setNewLoc​(Loc newLoc)
        Sets new Loc of tile to newLoc, allows for animation, tile remembers old loc and animates from old loc to new loc
        Parameters:
        newLoc - new Location of tile

      • getLoc

        public Loc getLoc()
        attempts to get the location of the tile
        Returns:
        location of the tile

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        toString method of the Tile
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        integer value of tile (2^power), or " " if empty

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        checks if tile is empty
        Returns:
        true if tile is empty, else false

      • initiate

        public int initiate()
        tries to initiate a new tile at an empty tile
        Returns:
        power of new tile, 0 if empty

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove()
        Checks if tile can be moved (if it's already been moved then cannot)
        Returns:
        NOT moved, so if the tile has been moved it returns false

      • moved

        public void moved()
        Tells tile that the tile has been moved

        Resets the moved state of tile
